verses.content: Ngai ta u, LALPA siehlaw, LALPA ina zâna ngîr hlak po pohai, LALPA chu inpâk ro.
In kuthai chu hmun inthieng tienga chun phar unla, LALPA chu inpâk ro.
LALPA chun Ziona inthawkin malsâwm raw se cheu, Hnuoi le vân siemtu ngei chun.
